com.paydiant.android.core.facade

Interface IDeviceInfoManagerFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceInfoManagerFacade

    public interface IDeviceInfoManagerFacade
    Facade defining the operations to manage the device specific information, such as device attributes, device specific ids/tokens etc.
    Since:
    4.5.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
      Adds the additional device info.
      void deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo(String... deleteKeys)
      Deletes the specified keys from the device info list.
      AdditionalInformationList retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()
      Retrieve additional device info.
      void updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
      Update or delete additional device info attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • addAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
        Adds the additional device info.
        Parameters:
        additionalInformationList - the additional device info list
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class. See IDeviceInfoService.addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoService.addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList)

      • updateAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
        Update or delete additional device info attributes. In order to delete a specific key, set the value of the key to be null or empty.
        Parameters:
        additionalInformationList - the additional device info list
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class. See IDeviceInfoService.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoService.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList)

      • retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo

        AdditionalInformationList retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()
        Retrieve additional device info.
        Returns:
        List of device information maintained at the server.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class. See IDeviceInfoService.retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo() for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoService.retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()

      • deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo(String... deleteKeys)
        Deletes the specified keys from the device info list. This method will internally call the updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList) method to perform the necessary deletes.
        Parameters:
        deleteKeys - List of keys needed to be deleted from the additional device info.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class. See IDeviceInfoService.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalDeviceInfoList) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList), IDeviceInfoService.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList)
